body: Trash opinions. Thicc Mikan and thicc Rito? It's a match made in heaven. This has no business being untranslated. It deserves a place in popular.
Quiet you brainwashed lolicon, I’m a player for both booby teams, suck my superior taste.

Even though i'm in the big boobs team, giving Mikan big boobs is just disgusting. This is worse than ntr.
No sorry, it's not but i hate it nonetheless
